body_raw: Before being so quick to downvote or throw darts, please forgive my ignorance and inability to recall basic calculus atm. Consider the limit $\lim \limits_{x \to \infty}\frac{3x^2+14x-5}{x^2+x-12}$. It can quickly be determined that the $x$ approaches $3$ using L'Hospital's rule.
